name: Edraw Compressed XML FIle
summary: Learn about .EDXZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Some template categories include Business Form, Flowchart, Mind Map, Fashion Design, Science, and Database. Under each of these categories you're able to choose the specific template you want to use.

To create an EDXZ file you must first open a template you'd like to use. You can do this by opening Edraw Max, then under the New tab on the left you can choose from the "Template Categories," then choose one of the "Templates." After you open your template, go to File â†’ Save As... then choose the EDXZ extension in the "Save as type" drop down menu.
NOTE: Compressed version of the .EDX file.

description: Compressed file created by Edraw Max, a diagram creating program; contains your customized diagrams created from Edraw Max's default templates; diagrams consist of arrows, shapes, and text; the compressed format is optimal for sharing projects with others.
